thread.title: Harvey, Mets set to take aim at Utley and Dodgers in Game 3
thread.title_full: Harvey, Mets set to take aim at Utley and Dodgers in Game 3

author: MIKE FITZPATRICK
title: Harvey, Mets set to take aim at Utley and Dodgers in Game 3
text:
Kathy Willens Harvey, Mets set to take aim at Utley and Dodgers in Game 3 
New York Mets Game 3 starter Matt Harvey appears during a National League Division Series baseball workout day, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in preparation for Monday's Game 3 against the Los Angeles Dodgers at CitiField in New York. (AP Photo/Kathy Willens) Kathy Willens Harvey, Mets set to take aim at Utley and Dodgers in Game 3 
Los Angeles Dodgers pitcher Clayton Kershaw catches for fellow pitcher Brett Anderson during a workout Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in preparation for Monday's NLDS baseball game against the New York Mets at CitiField in New York. (AP Photo/Kathy Willens) Kathy Willens Harvey, Mets set to take aim at Utley and Dodgers in Game 3 
Los Angeles Dodgers Game 3 starting pitcher Brett Anderson speaks during a press conference on National League Division Series workout day, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in preparation for Monday's Game 3 against the New York Mets, at CitiField in New York. (AP Photo/Kathy Willens) Kathy Willens Harvey, Mets set to take aim at Utley and Dodgers in Game 3 
The National League Division Series logo is painted on the field during a baseball workout Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in preparation for Monday's Game 3 between the New York Mets and the Los Angeles Dodgers at CitiField in New York. (AP Photo/Kathy Willens) Posted: Sunday, October 11, 2015 9:20 pm | Updated: 10:15 pm, Sun Oct 11, 2015. 
NEW YORK (AP) — All of a sudden, Matt Harvey's postseason debut contains an extra layer of drama.
